sentences.en: Chambers' voice droned, maddening as an insect around his head.
sentences.cn: 钱伯斯一直在他耳边嗡嗡地说个不停，他都快疯了。

sentences.en: Efforts to develop tribal energy face a maddening set of obstacles.
sentences.cn: 在部落开发能源的努力面临一系列十分恼人的障碍.

sentences.en: I flip through my favorite papers and magazines, the images as crisp as in print, without a maddening wait for each page to load.
sentences.cn: 我浏览着我喜爱的报纸和杂志，图片犹如印刷的一般明亮清晰，每一页的载入没有出现令人发狂的等待。

sentences.en: If everyone else also finds him maddening, the answer is Yes.
sentences.cn: 如果其他所有人也发现他令人生气, 那么答案就是肯定的.

sentences.en: In addition to Jem's newly developed characteristics , he had acquired a maddening air of wisdom.
sentences.cn: 杰姆身上除了最近出现的怪脾气外,还添上了一副叫人受不了的自作聪明的派头.

sentences.en: It is a maddening job Mr Ban has won.
sentences.cn: 对潘基文来说,这是一项充满挑战的工作.

sentences.en: It is, in its way, a maddening biography.
sentences.cn: 客观来说，这部传记很是令人气愤。

sentences.en: It's all frustrating, even maddening , because what's happened doesn't make sense.
sentences.cn: 令人沮丧, 甚至疯狂的是, 过去发生的事不能说明什么.

sentences.en: Our maddening frustration was in fact the final spasm of a decade of struggle.
sentences.cn: 我们最感痛心的,就是打了十年仗,末了还要吃一阵苦头.

sentences.en: Shopping in the January sales can be maddening.
sentences.cn: 在元月促销期间购物可能会让人大为恼火。

sentences.en: The box has been spitting forth maddening nine - second sound bites ( Mary McGrory )
sentences.cn: 便携式立体收录机里正播放一段令人受不了的长达九秒的讲话 ( 玛丽麦格罗里 )

sentences.en: The box has been spitting forth maddening nine - second sound bites.
sentences.cn: 电视机已经整整吐放了九秒钟令人疯狂的插播.

sentences.en: The intervals of silence grew progressively longer ; the delays became maddening.
sentences.cn: 他等着每一次敲击声,烦躁而恐惧, 自己也不知道为什么.

sentences.en: This foolish, recurring misinformation about mineral oil and petrolatum is maddening.
sentences.cn: 这种针对矿物油的愚蠢, 复发的误传使人发怒.

sentences.en: While that brings greater efficiency to the process for employers, it can be awfully maddening for job seekers.
sentences.cn: 虽然这样给雇主带来了很高的效率，但是对求职者来说却可能是让人发狂的痛苦过程。
